input.sentences: we had dinner at a friend 's house a few weeks ago .
this is her with one of my daughters .
they love visiting each other as often as we can .
one of my daughters drew this picture for her and put it on the table .
we took a few more pictures like this one before going home .
output.sentences: We visited the house of a friend for two weeks, over the summer.
She has several daughters, who enjoyed playing with mine.
I love her house and her kids and our friendship, so visiting her was great fun.
The kids drew pictures of all of us to make place cards for the table, what a fun idea.
We brought my daughters pictures home to place in our memory book.
